ConceptDef.label: Guest beds
ConceptDef.helpText: Visitors prefer to sleep in beds.\n\nThere are specific guest beds you can build for them.

ConceptDef.label: Recruiting guests
ConceptDef.helpText: You can recruit guests.\n\nRecruiting a guest will cost you goodwill with the guest's faction. Make sure you have a colonist with good social skills assigned for negotiation.
